displayName.Description: The display name for the approval stage.

status.Description: This read-only field specifies the status of an approval. Possible values include: 'NotStarted', 'InProgress', 'Completed', 'Expired', 'Initializing', 'Escalating', 'Completing', 'Escalated'

assignedToMe.Description: Indicates whether the stage is assigned to me for review

reviewedDateTime.Description: Date Time when a decision was taken.

reviewResult.Description: The decision on the approval stage. This value is initially set to NotReviewed. Approvers can take action of Approve/Deny. Possible values include: 'Approve', 'Deny', 'NotReviewed'

justification.Description: Justification provided by approvers for their action

principalType.Description: The identity type : user/servicePrincipal. Possible values include: 'user', 'servicePrincipal'
